name: Secret Easter Egg Hunt Hidden Objects Game (iPad Edition)
name_original: Secret Easter Egg Hunt Hidden Objects Game (iPad Edition)
description:
Secret Easter Egg Hunt Hidden Objects Game

Join the Fun as you participate in Easter Egg Hunt in the Park and Hidden Gardens.

This is the perfect pre teen app for the colorful holiday that challenges you in the most unique Hiding Objects Easter Egg Hunt Game that you have played.

Are you up to the Challenge?

This Easter Story takes you through 5 Beautiful, Hand Crafted levels where you have to locate 5 extremely valuable Easter Eggs that are lost.

Help the Easter Bunny locate his Prized Eggs as they have been taken and Hidden throughout the park and gardens.

These Secret Easter Eggs include a Magical Chocolate Egg, Silver Egg, Jewel Egg, Ruby Egg and the Golden Easter Egg.

This Hidden Pictures Game includes:
*5 Beautiful Levels
*6 Achievements
*5 Hidden Secret Easter Eggs
*100+ Hidden Objects
*Leader Board
*Timer Game
*Free Updates

The Secret Easter Egg Hunt Hidden Objects Game is a perfect as a challenging young girls game, boys game, kids game, or any one looking to have some Easter Fun.

Makes a great Easter Gift App for the special people in your life.

Hurry before price goes up!!

FREE Updates!!
